title: Okay Mods... I have something to say
body:
There was a person who came to GD to vent and talk about IRL problems... I feel like that should be an allowed subject. Where else can you turn to when there is no one to talk to in real life? I wrote out a huge post to help someone who had been dealing with pretty heavy stuff and they never got to see it because  the thread was deleted. I like to help people, and I feel that on occasion we do get a few completely honest posts about peoples' problems in life, and they need at least a response. I feel like I could have actually helped that person because I myself have dealt with similar issues and have learned to cope with it. Now it is gone and they will never know what I had to say, and even if it only helped a little, that is a heck of a lot more useful than any LoL meme....

Please... I know people like to complain about their IRL problems, and most are just venting to vent, but some people legitimately need help, and I'd be more than willing to see tons of threads about how someone doesn't have a boyfriend or girlfriend (we know what I am saying) so that these people also have the right to talk about things seriously impacting their life.

GD might be a bit of a monster sometimes, but when we see people legitimately struggling.... No one is that heartless.
